Verses.1: Then the angel showed me a river of the water of life. It's crystal clear and flowing from the throne of God and the Lamb.
Verses.2: It flows down the middle of the street, and nourished the tree of life. The tree produces twelve kinds of fruit, every month for harvest, and its leaves were for the healing of the nations.
Verses.3: No longer will there be any curse. The throne of God and the Lamb will be in the city, and His servants will serve Him.
Verses.4: His servants will see God's face, and His name will be on their foreheads.
Verses.5: There will no longer be any night. No longer will they need the light of a lamp, nor the light of the sun. For the Lord God will be their light. And God and the Lamb will reign forever and ever.

Changes: 2023-10-31 - Paul Prins: Clarified a pronoun in verse 5.
